```{r}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
dt <- mtcars[1:5, 1:8]
dt <- cbind(dt, dt, dt)
```

```{r}
kable(dt, format = "latex", booktabs = T) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("striped", "hold_position", "scale_down")) %>%
  landscape()
```
